video.title: Ringer
video.synopsis: Sarah Michelle Gellar plays estranged identical twins in this nail-biting dramatic series that finds one of them taking over the life of the other.

episodes.synopsis: Bridget Kelly is six-months sober and starting to turn her life around when she is the sole witness in a murder trial against a dangerous man.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Bridget struggles to figure out a way to cover up a crime she has just committed, while still convincing everyone she's Siobhan Martin.
episodes.title: She's Ruining Everything

episodes.synopsis: Bridget discovers some interesting information about Andrew, which causes strain between them. Tensions flare between Henry and Gemma.
episodes.title: If You Ever Want A French Lesson

episodes.synopsis: Still posing as Siobhan, Bridget heads to the Hamptons with Andrew, Gemma and Henry to celebrate her birthday like they would do every year.
episodes.title: It's Gonna Kill Me, But I'll Do It

episodes.synopsis: Gemma asks Bridget, who is still posing as Siobhan, to do her a favor that could cost Bridget everything. Henry is given some crushing news.
episodes.title: A Whole New Kind Of Bitch

episodes.synopsis: When Bridget cannot get in touch with Gemma, she begins to wonder if something has happened between Gemma and Henry. Juliet starts a new school.
episodes.title: The Poor Kids Do It Every Day

episodes.synopsis: Still posing as Siobhan, Bridget is forced to reveal she has a twin to Andrew and Henry when agent Machado starts closing in.
episodes.title: Oh Gawd, There's Two Of Them?

episodes.synopsis: Andrew is told some upsetting news that also affects Henry. Juliet continues to form an unlikely bond with her teacher Mr. Carpenter.
episodes.title: Maybe We Can Get A Dog Instead?

episodes.synopsis: Bridget begins to realize she is developing feelings for Andrew while Henry and Andrew's business partner Olivia bond over common interests.
episodes.title: Shut Up and Eat Your Bologna

episodes.synopsis: Henry begins to target someone as a suspect in the disappearance of his wife and realizes he must work with Bridget to find out more information.
episodes.title: That's What You Get For Trying To Kill Me

episodes.synopsis: Bridget offers to host a fundraiser that her friend is holding for Juliet's school and discovers that Greer knew one of Siobhan's deep dark secrets.
episodes.title: It Just Got Normal

episodes.synopsis: Juliet's mother, Catherine, arrives in New York. She then proceeds to wreak havoc on Andrew and Bridget's relationship.
episodes.title: What Are You Doing Here, Ho-Bag?

episodes.synopsis: Bridget visits some of the last locations Siobhan went before she disappeared and discovers that Siobhan kept a secret office.
episodes.title: It's Easy To Cry When This Much Cash Is Involved

episodes.synopsis: Bridget encounters Dylan, who was an important part of the sisters' past.  Malcolm befriends Henry to keep an eye on him.
episodes.title: Whores Don't Make That Much

episodes.synopsis: Bridget realizes she is in over her head. Olivia becomes increasingly suspicious of Malcolm while he is working at Martin/Charles.
episodes.title: P.S. You're An Idiot

episodes.synopsis: Agent Machado's past with his informant, stripper Shaylene Briggs, is revealed and Siobhan deceives Malcolm when she pretends to be Bridget.
episodes.title: You're Way Too Pretty To Go To Jail

episodes.synopsis: Bridget fears that something has happened to Malcolm when she cannot get in touch with him. In an effort to find him, Bridget visits Malcolm's hotel.
episodes.title: What We Have Is Worth The Pain

episodes.synopsis: After an attempt is made on Bridget's life, agent Machado is determined to find who was responsible. Henry accuses Siobhan of putting out the hit.
episodes.title: That Woman's Never Been a Victim Her Entire Life

episodes.synopsis: Bridget decides that the only way she will feel safe is if she testifies against Bodaway Macawi. Agent Machado gets suspended from the FBI.
episodes.title: Lets Kill Bridget

episodes.synopsis: Still posing as Siobhan, Bridget admits to agent Machado that someone tried to kill her months earlier and she thought it was Andrew.
episodes.title: If You're Just an Evil Bitch, Then Get Over It

episodes.synopsis: Catherine's plan to drive Andrew and Bridget apart unravels. Agent Machado discovers who wanted to kill Siobhan all along.
episodes.title: It's Called Improvising, Bitch!

episodes.synopsis: The vow renewals near, Bridget realizes she first needs to tell Andrew the truth about who she really is, just as Bodaway Macawi starts to close in.
episodes.title: I'm The Good Twin
